text:
Went in to istudio T4 on 25 Mar 2025 1150pm and was served by an elderly man. Approached him with the complete intention to purchase iPhone 16 Pro Max 256gb White Titanium at the price reflected on price board; however; I was rudely notified that the price reflected is “PROMOTION PRICE” with condition that I MUST BUY $250 worth of AppleCare. I asked where was this condition anywhere reflected in the shop, and he mentioned this is company instruction. I reconfirmed with him again if this is true, he confidently said yes!

I will make sure a formal complain to relevant authorities is made, as such unethical practices is surely not the first encounter per several reviews below.

I had an exceptional experience purchasing my new iPhone, thanks to the incredible staff Micky. From the moment I walked in, they were sharp, professional, and extremely knowledgeable about the product. She patiently answered all my questions, ensuring I understood every detail before making my decision. Micky expertise and willingness to assist made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. It’s rare to find such a high level of service, and I truly appreciate their dedication. Highly recommend this store for anyone looking for top-tier customer service!

Not all storks are available, it's recommend you check before hand.

The iStudio at Changi Airport Terminal 4 is a great place to buy Apple products. The staff is friendly and helpful, and they have a wide selection of products to choose from. The store is also open 24 hours a day, which is convenient for travelers. I would definitely recommend this store to anyone looking for Apple products in Singapore.

Got my iPhone 16 Pro from T4 iStudio for my girl on 27 March late evening with pleasure of interacting with Kian Hwee, and I must say the experience was exceptional. From the moment I reached the shop, he is attentive, friendly, and efficient in addressing our enquiry. He ensure that I had all the information I needed and made the process smooth and hassle-free. His positive attitude and professionalism made me feel valued as a customer. I’m genuinely grateful for the assistance we received. Thank you for making my purchase a pleasant one.

Got my iphone 16 pro max here at terminal 4 . I would like to extend my big thanks to Ms. Christine who handle all my questions so well. I also loved her recommendations and all. Thank you Ms. Christine.
